pages.text: $(italic)You think back happily to the days when you set little traps for your friends. Touching the wrong block, they were completely buried by sand.$(br)By now, your friends aren't so easily fooled.$(br2)Seems like modern problems require modern solutions.

By adding redstone and a bit of magic to sand, it gains an interesting property: like other blocks, it stays in the air until the Gemstone Powder inside it starts vibrating.$(br2)Redstone Sand behaves like a solid block until it gets a Redstone signal.$(br)The Redstone trigger propagates through all connected blocks, destabilizing them and laws of gravity force it to drop.
